body.name: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 5 (27+ lbs) Surprise Pack for Girls - 72 Count of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel - Assorted Girl & Gender Neutral Patterns
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 48 mins
features: Doody-catchers. Crap-sacks. Tinkle-poopers. Whatever you want to call them, our plant-based, super soft and absorbent disposable diapers are a modern convenience you don't want to live without
Say Hello to adorable Surprise designs. And say Goodbye to plain diapers. Our Surprise patterns are curated with girl and gender-neutral assortments for every parent's need. Go ahead, take your pick!
MADE WITHOUT: parabens, phthalates...basically, it's made with the good stuff.
Includes (1) 72ct surprise pack of diapers in girl & gender neutral designs for infants and toddlers (Size 5)
Hello Bello believes in giving back and has donated over 7 million diapers (and a heckuva lot of wipes and care products) to parents in need
body.description: Hello Bello Premium Baby Diapers are designed by parents, so we know first-hand that preventing leaks and blowouts is a must. Been there, done that, don't want to deal with it. We also wanted to create a diaper with ingredients we could be proud of, that was soft on sensitive skin, and was made with just as much consideration for the planet we live on as the babies we love - all at an affordable price. So that's just what we did. Box contains 72 count size 5 disposable baby diapers in Surprise Girl & Gender Neutral patterns.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Promises Premium For All You shouldn’t have to choose between what’s best for your baby and what’s best for your budget. Our mission is to create the highest quality products at the most reasonable cost, because we believe every child deserves the best. Happier Babies, Happier Planet We love your littles, so from using organic botanicals in our body care to running our facilities on renewable energy, our products are thoughtfully created to be safe and effective for babies, and better for their world. Our Parent Pledge Parenting is hard for everyone, but much harder for those without adequate support. We’ve donated over 6 million diapers and are fighting for policy changes that will help end diaper need. We pledge to help however we can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are so soft and work very well! Cute patterns too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and absorbent
reviews.reviewText: I feel like these are comparable to some other name brand, more expensive options. They have a long absorbent layer, can hold at least half a days worth of wetness, and the tabs don’t deteriorate even with generous application of water soluble lubricants underneath. No slips, drips, easy tab grip and hold. We haven’t had a leak yet. The only negative we can find is in comparison to some previous brands we loved that went out of business, these do get droopy when full and have no wetness line indicator. Though maybe the droop is the unintentional indicator. Overall love these and will be sticking with them until potty trained!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These continue to be the best quality diapers made with the best ingredients. They are the most affordable and really work! These are the only diapers I buy now, I highly recommend these!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recommend to all of my friends with kids.
reviews.reviewText: We love this entire line of products. The diapers are great and the over night ones are a must have for older babies. The bath products are all natural and smell great. I wasn’t impressed with the shipping and delivery. They were late and the delivery driver left them in the rain. Had we not been home they would have been ruined. But that is Amazon and not the products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: They’re really cute diapers but size 5 is more like 4 compared to other diaper companies. I wouldn’t use them at night

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love hello bello, because I feel like they are a good non toxic diaper that I feel comfortable letting my daughter wear, they are also true to size, and don’t have a weird smell to them like other “non toxic” I’ve purchased. They are reasonably priced and have the cutest designs on them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They are alright
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to find diapers that our better for our babies but now I have heard that many diaper companies (including hello hello) are changing where they have chlorine additives to safe on cost? I’m a newly crunchy mom so do your research.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Source of major inflammation and painful rash
reviews.reviewText: Subscribed to receive Hello Bello diapers every month for my 1 and a half year old son. After 48 hours of receiving the diapers and him wearing them consistently, he developed a severe, blistering rash on every part of his body the diaper was touching. At the time, I just thought he was getting diaper rash in general, not because of the diapers. It continued to get worse and looked and felt so painful, he would scream our in pain even if he sat in cool water in the tub. We took him to the doctor and the doctor confirmed that it wasn’t a fungal infection, bacterial infection, and that it was essentially a form of SEVERE diaper rash. For the record, he is the healthiest little boy, has not had any medical issues or scares, and has hardly experienced diaper rash in his life until now. And even the one or two times he did have it in the past, it was so minor that it would resolve immediately after using butt paste or Desitin. Super bummed out about the overall experienced with trying these diapers. They have caused my little one excruciating pain and became so severe, he had to just wear a light cloth-like diaper for a week in order for the rash and intense blistering to heal.

I would walk to the ends of the earth for Hello Bello diapers 😂 Harsh chemical free, soft, absorbent AND the designs are super cute… YES PLEASE 100%. My daughter had been getting a peely rough patch on her hip from another brand so I quickly jumped on the Hello Bello bandwagon and I have no jumped off since! Especially since she loves to choose which design she wears, it makes diaper changes with an active toddler a tad bit easier. She’s been wearing these from newborn to now (19 months)! *An important note to add is I sized up as I wasn’t sure what size would fit her (normally wears a 5 but wears a 6 in HB) but my daughter is also very tall so these smaller packs are great for size testing or just throwing in a diaper bag for a day or two away!
